name: Mystery Portals
description:
This is my first Game Jam and also my first complete game...Finally!

How To Play

In this game you have to use portals to arrive to the end of the levels and enter in the holes to go to the next level.

You can't touch the spikes or you will come back at the start of the current level.

Credits

I did all the programming and graphics and i took the music and sound effects online.

I hope you will like the game. Enjoy!
